nextSteps.title: Next steps
nextSteps.mapDataGateway: Wrap DataGateway APIs with type-safe React hooks.
nextSteps.portTokens: Port visual tokens from the static dashboard into shared CSS variables.
nextSteps.addRouting: Add authenticated routing and progressively migrate real panels.
